thread.title: Social Security Q&A: What's the Effect of Income after My Full Retirement Age?
thread.title_full: Social Security Q&A: What's the Effect of Income after My Full Retirement Age? - Forbes

author: Laurence Kotlikoff
title: Social Security Q&A: What's the Effect of Income after My Full Retirement Age?
text:
Social Security may be one of your largest assets. What and when you collect will make a huge difference to your lifetime benefits.
Today’s Social Security question is about the earnings test and full retirement age.
Question : If I am at full retirement age and paid per diem and hourly wages, how does the per diem affect my Social Security?
Answer : There is no earnings test after you reach full retirement, so earning money by the hour or per diem has no effect on your benefits.
My weekly Social Security column appears on PBS NEWSHOUR’s website .
